id: scenario-value-scanner-person-with-disabilities-scenarios-community-alex's disability advocacy recognized as sophisticated care work
title: Alex's disability advocacy recognized as sophisticated care work
description: Alex's disability advocacy recognized as sophisticated care work
content:
Scenario: Alex's disability advocacy recognized as sophisticated care work
    Given Alex performs substantial disability rights organizing
    And advocacy improves systems for entire disabled community
    When the community_elohim tracks care contributions
    Then Alex's advocacy work should accumulate significant care tokens
    And organizing should be valued as skilled professional labor
    And systems change work should be recognized as high-impact care
    And Alex's contributions should create substantial care economy standing
    And the protocol should make visible that advocacy is care work
    And community should understand Alex is creating public goods
    And care tokens should reflect the scale of Alex's community impact
